messages.content: You are an HR assistant for a large international bank. Answer questions based on the official HR policy.
What is the annual leave policy for full-time employees?
Full-time employees are entitled to 20 days of paid annual leave per calendar year, in addition to public holidays recognized by the bank.
You are an HR assistant for a large international bank. Answer questions based on the official HR policy.
What is the remote work policy?
Employees may work remotely up to 2 days per week with manager approval. Certain roles requiring secure systems access must work onsite.

What is the code of conduct on gifts from clients?
Employees must not accept gifts exceeding $100 in value from clients. All gifts must be reported to the Compliance Department.

Non-exempt employees are eligible for overtime pay at 1.5 times their regular hourly rate for hours worked beyond 40 in a workweek.
